data.name: Wunderdoktor - Official Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Official Soundtrack for Wunderdoktor, including 24 Tracks.

All the songs were handcrafted by Konstantin & Elenor Kopka.
By listening to the soundtrack, you will be able to relive the game's journey in a different way.

This purchase contains 24 songs as 320 kbps High Quality MP3

After dowloading, you will find the file "Wunderdoktor - Official Soundtrack.zip" in your game folder (the one with the executable: Steam/steamapps/common/Wunderdoktor)

Tracklist:


01 - Main Theme
02 - Act 1 Theme - The Earnest Plains
03 - The Early Bird
04 - The Quacks - Hans Meise
05 - Tunnel to Greenrealm
06 - Act 2 Theme - Greenrealm
07 - The Town Amuser - Cheerful
08 - The Town Amuser - Drunk
09 - The Quacks - Irma Bienenfresser
10 - Tunnel to the Coal Mines
11 - Act 3 Theme - The Coal Mines
12 - The Quacks - Rita Aaskraehe
13 - Escape from Red Mountain
14 - Act 4 Theme - The Ocean Floor
15 - The Inspector
16 - The Quacks - Mikael Moewe
17 - Entering Beaktown
18 - Act 5 Theme - Beaktown
19 - Quack Finale - Hans Meise
20 - Quack Finale - Irma Bienenfresser
21 - Quack Finale - Rita Aaskraehe
22 - Quack Finale - Mikael Moewe
23 - Quack Finale - Vincent Rabe
24 - Golden Glow

data.short_description: The Official Soundtrack for Wunderdoktor, including 24 Tracks.All the songs were handcrafted by Konstantin & Elenor Kopka.By listening to the soundtrack, you will be able to relive the game's journey in a different way.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100T @ 2.50 GHz / AMD Phenom II X3 B73
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4850 or NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 @ 3.10 GHz / AMD Phenom II X6 1100T
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7700 or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 570
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Dedicated Sound Card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6.3 Leopard 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-540M @ 2.53 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 6750M or NVIDIA GeForce GT 330M
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Sound
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.9 Mavericks 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-540M @ 3.40 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R9 M290X or Nvidia GeForce GTX 775M 2GB
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Dedicated Sound Card

linux_requirements.minimum:

  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100T @ 2.50 GHz / AMD Phenom II X3 B73
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4850 or NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

linux_requirements.recommended:
